 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּק‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==constrain, bring into straits, press upon== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּק‎</span> ***be distressed*** (rare), Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***be narrow, tight***, so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִיק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — Perfect 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵצִיקָה‎</span> [[Judg.16.16|Judg 16:16]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֱצִיקַתְהוּ‎</span> [[Judg.14.17|Judg 14:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִ֑י‎</span> [[Job.32.18|Job 32:18]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]] v[[Job.32.19|Job 32:19]]); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲצִיקוֺתִ֫י‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.29.2|Isa 29:2]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצִיק‎</span> [[Deut.28.53|Deut 28:53]] + 2 t.; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצִיקוּ‎</span> [[Jer.19.9|Jer 19:9]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵצִיק‎</span> [[Isa.51.13|Isa 51:13]] (twice in verse), plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצִיקִים‎</span> [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]] — ***bring into straits***, by importunity with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Judg.16.16|Judg 16:16]], with suffix person [[Judg.14.17|Judg 14:17]] ***constrain*** (to speak) [[Job.32.18|Job 32:18]] (suffix person); elsewhere of ***bringing into straits*** a city or people, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>, [[Isa.29.2|Isa 29:2]]; [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]], so [[Isa.7.6|Isa 7:6]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְצִיקֶנָּה‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְקִיצֶנָּה‎</span>), [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]], compare formula <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמָצוֺר וּבְמָצוֺק אֲשֶׁר יָצ‎</span> [[Deut.28.53|Deut 28:53]]; [[Deut.28.55|Deut 28:55]]; [[Deut.28.57|Deut 28:57]]; [[Jer.19.9|Jer 19:9]] participle absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמֵּצִיק‎</span> [[Isa.51.13|Isa 51:13]] (twice in verse) ***the oppressor***.
